## Index

>[Welcome to the course!]{.highlight}
This part of the course introduces the foundations of neuroscience. We will cover basic principles of **neurobiology**,  
an introduction to `neurophysiology`, and the core concepts needed to understand how the nervous system works,
from neurons to systems.
